originalText.text: A guy on the street from the organization asked me to provide a 1 time donation. I did and I saw him place it as recurring. I literally thought it was a mistake and told him I SAID ONE TIME. He agreed. I have been getting a recurring donation for months. I've told multiple people to cancel it. THEY WON'T EVER CANCEL IT. DON'T DO IT. GIVE TO A CHURCH. THIS IS A SCAM.

originalText.text: They occupy all types of public space. From walking paths to bike paths and everything in between. Is this public park pan handling the best way to accomplish your goals because it doesn’t make me think highly of this organization.

originalText.text: I have also been charged for well over a year now, and they will NOT cancel my subscription. If they don't offer a full refund when I call them tomorrow, my next call will be to the better business bureau.
